solution_line_template: From the bride's side, {bride_couples} couples * {guests_per_couple} guests/couple = <<{bride_couples}*{guests_per_couple}={bride_guests}>>{bride_guests} guests attended
From the groom's side, {groom_couples} couples * {guests_per_couple} guests/couple = <<{groom_couples}*{guests_per_couple}={groom_guests}>>{groom_guests} guests attended
Therefore {total_guests} guests - ({bride_guests} guests + {groom_guests} guests) = <<{total_guests}-({bride_guests}+{groom_guests})={friends}>>{friends} friends attended the reception
